name: Moris Managed Meticulously
description:
Match the Moris into their Margins!

This is an unofficial fangame featuring Mori Calliope of Hololive inspired heavily by Cats Organized Neatly.  Place the puzzle pieces onto the tiles and try to fit all of them on the board. Enjoy the levels and art made by the community centered around our favorite reaper, Mori Calliope. 

Play in browser above or scroll down below for the Standalone Windows version

Features:

  • 60 ready made levels made by members of the community
  • 30 art pieces made by members of the community
  • Gallery Mode  to view each art piece
  • A Level Editor  that allows the creation and playing of custom levels

Streaming Content: Please feel free to record or stream this game however you'd like.

Disclaimers: We are not affiliated with Hololive or Cover Corp. in any way. This project was made while following all guidelines under the Hololive Derivative Works guidelines (https://en.hololive.tv/terms). All visual and music assets used in this game are originally made for this game specifically. All font assets cleared for usage under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.
